text: Allan Hunter (born 30 June 1946 in Northern Ireland) is a former Northern Irish football player. He was a defender. He also spent most of his career at Ipswich Town. He made over 350 appearances in eleven years. ==Managerial statistics== Team Nat From To Record G W D L Won %! title: Allan Hunter (footballer)
